igmp Struct Reference
[XgIgmp, XgIgmp]

#include <netinet/igmp.h>

Detailed Description

IGMP packet structure.


Data Fields

u_char igmp_type
 Version and type of IGMP message.
u_char igmp_code
 Subtype for routing messages.
u_short igmp_cksum
 IP-style checksum.
u_long igmp_group
 Group address being reported.
